mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE.NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, EMP_NAME, NOTICE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "NOTICE_CREATE_DATE", NOTICE_ATTACHMENT.NOTICE_ORIGIN_NAME FROM NOTICE JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN NOTICE_ATTACHMENT ON (NOTICE.NOTICE_NO = NOTICE_ATTACHMENT.NOTICE_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE.NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{NOTICE_NO} AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE.NOTICE_NO, EMP_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "NOTICE_CREATE_DATE", NOTICE_ATTACHMENT.NOTICE_ORIGIN_NAME, NOTICE_ATTACHMENT.NOTICE_CHANGE_NAME FROM NOTICE JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN NOTICE_ATTACHMENT ON (NOTICE.NOTICE_NO = NOTICE_ATTACHMENT.NOTICE_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE.NOTICE_NO = #{NOTICE_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, EMP_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_ORIGIN_NAME, NOTICE_CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeOriginName}, #{noticeChangeName} )

INSERT INTO NOTICE_ATTACHMENT ( NOTICE_FILE_NO, NOTICE_ORIGIN_NAME, NOTICE_CHANGE_NAME, NOTICE_FILE_PATH, NOTICE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NANO.NEXTVAL, #{noticeOriginName}, #{noticeChangeName}, #{noticeFilePath}, #{noticeNo} )
